CustomField.formula: (CASE( Commitment_Recap__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Set_the_Agenda__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Rapport__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Client_Updates__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Our_Process__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Activities__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Responses_Prospects__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Meetings__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Your_Pipeline__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Review_Consulting_Touch__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Recommendations_to_Client__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( X360_Degree_Marketing__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Talked_about_The_Grow_Show__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Lifetime_Partnership__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( State_of_Business__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Recap_Commitments__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Payment__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Referrals__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Confirm_Next_Meeting_Date__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0))/38
